DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate risk factors and complications of ventral hernia repair. A retrospective study of journal files with patients undergoing ventral hernia repair, and an analyses of complications by use of the Clavien-Dindo classification of surgical complications.
DOC.brief_title: Risk Factors and Complications of Ventral Hernia Repair
DOC.criteria: Surgically treated ventral hernia repair All surgically treated patients are included
